lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Funaro, who spoke today to the International Monetary Fund's interim committee, was referring to talks he began Tuesday with creditor banks in New York in which unveiled Brazil's economic targets and financial needs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The governor of Sao Paulo state Orestes Quersia and other governors last night called on Brazilian President Jose Sarney to assume direct control of the debt negotiations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Funaro said discussions on Brazil's refinancing proposals were well under way with private creditor banks and added World Bank President Barber Conable had also accepted the proposals as "a good plan" at a meeting they had last night.
